page.title: 12Cars owned in J.4.
page.content: Every family except one has got a car in it but some families have got two cars. The most popular firm thats makes cars are Ford,ten families have got Ford in their family.The sort of cars they have got are Granadas,Escorts, Cortinas and Sierras. The next popular model is British Leyland.The sort of cars they have are Allegros, Princesses,Maestros,Maxis and Montegos .Some families have Renaults,Citroens, Volvos,Cavaliers and Ladas. In our family we have two cars they are a Volvo 343 DL and a Saab which is a company car so we do not always have the same car.The Volvo is my Mums but the Saab is a car my Dad drives.They are both very comfortable.
